Talk_0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Oh! Link!<sp:5:0:0> I see you've journeyed here
as well.
Talk_0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Our investigation of the geoglyphs has
brought us to Gerudo Town. The thing is...<sp:5:1:0>

<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0901>"No voe allowed!"<sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_01>That's what they said as they stubbornly
denied me entrance. Lady Impa is in town
gathering information right now.
That means there's nothing for me to do
but while away the hours guarding our
balloon.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0300>I can't believe I was forced to leave Lady
Impa's side... How mortifying that I can't
fulfill my duty of protecting her.
<snd:Sad_00>Oh, Lady Impa... Please come back soon.
Talk_0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Sad>Lady Impa is gathering information in
Gerudo Town. All by herself. *sigh*

<sp:3:0:2:0a01>Oh, Lady Impa... Please come back soon.
